text: If you show me something outdated  don t get mad at me for thinking it s up to date ffs Today at school I was required to fill out a paper where I would choose my subjects for the year  I was required to get   points and each subject was worth a designated amount of points  So I chose some and calculated that it would be   I brought the paper back and I thought that was it  Until I was approached by a teacher  who said  don t try to cheat your way out of this  You can t choose under   points worth of subjects So then I calculated what the points would be and I got    Then I asked the teacher to calculate it herself  She then told me that arts was only worth two points despite it saying   on the paper  She then asked  didn t your big brother or cousin tell you that that s outdated  Nowadays arts is only two points Why tf did the paper still say   then  Anyway I chose swedish as another   points and that was that   One time I asked if I could go to the bathroom during class  and I did get permission  The second floor bathroom was out of order so the first floor was my only choice  I headed there and on the girl s bathroom it said  only for the disabled  i then got confused because we didn t have any more bathrooms so I headed back to my class and asked the teacher where I could go   Downstairs bathroom  duh But it says it s for disabled people only Not while the construction is going on upstairs  Didn t your older sibling tell you this She then called me dumb for not knowing that it wasn t actually only for disabled people
